verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H561>words.<s%> Lay <S%H6845>up<s%> my commandments within <S%H4687>you.<s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H2421>live!<s%> Guard my <S%H8451>teaching<s%> as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of your <S%H5869>eye.<s%>
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them on your <S%H676>fingers.<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> them on the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> "You are my <S%H269>sister.<s%>" <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H2451>understanding<s%> your <S%H4129>relative,<s%>
that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> from the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> who <S%H2505>flatters<s%> with her <S%H561>words.<s%>
For at the <S%H2474>window<s%> of my <S%H1004>house,<s%> I <S%H8259>looked<s%> out through my <S%H822>lattice.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> among the simple <S%H6612>ones.<s%> I <S%H995>discerned<s%> among the <S%H1121>youths<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding,<s%>
passing <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H7784>street<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> her <S%H6434>corner,<s%> he <S%H6805>went<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to her <S%H1004>house,<s%>
in the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> in the <S%H3117>evening<s%> of the <S%H380>day,<s%> in the middle of the <S%H3915>night<s%> and in the <S%H653>darkness.<s%>
<S%H802>Behold,<s%> there a woman <S%H7125>met<s%> him with the <S%H7897>attire<s%> of a <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and with <S%H5341>crafty<s%> <S%H3820>intent.<s%>
She is <S%H1993>loud<s%> and <S%H5637>defiant.<s%> Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7931>don't<s%> stay in her <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H6471>Now<s%> she is in the <S%H7339>streets,<s%> <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H7339>squares,<s%> and <S%H693>lurking<s%> <S%H681>at<s%> every <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
So she <S%H2388>caught<s%> <S%H5401>him,<s%> and kissed <S%H5810>him.<s%> With an impudent <S%H6440>face<s%> she said to <S%H559>him:<s%>
"Sacrifices of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> are with <S%H3117>me.<s%> This day I have <S%H7999>paid<s%> my <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
Therefore I came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7836>you,<s%> to diligently seek your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I have found <S%H4672>you.<s%>
I have <S%H7234>spread<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with <S%H4765>carpets<s%> of <S%H2405>tapestry,<s%> with striped cloths of the <S%H330>yarn<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
I have <S%H5130>perfumed<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H174>aloes,<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon.<s%>
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> <S%H7301>let<s%>'s take our fill of <S%H1730>loving<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> <S%H5965>Let<s%>'s solace ourselves with <S%H159>loving.<s%>
For my <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H1004>isn't<s%> at home. He has <S%H1980>gone<s%> on a <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey.<s%>
He has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> with <S%H3027>him.<s%> He will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> at the <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3677>moon.<s%>"
With <S%H7230>persuasive<s%> <S%H3948>words,<s%> she led him <S%H5186>astray.<s%> With the <S%H2506>flattering<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> she seduced <S%H5080>him.<s%>

He <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310>her<s%> <S%H6597>immediately,<s%> as an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> as a <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H4148>stepping<s%> into a <S%H5914>noose.<s%>

Until an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> <S%H6398>strikes<s%> through his <S%H3516>liver,<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H4116>hurries<s%> to the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> and <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know that it will cost his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Now <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> sons, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H7181>me.<s%> Pay attention to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H3820>Don't<s%> let your heart <S%H7847>turn<s%> to her <S%H1870>ways.<s%> <S%H8582>Don't<s%> go astray in her <S%H5410>paths,<s%>
for she has thrown <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>wounded.<s%> <S%H2026>Yes,<s%> all her slain are a mighty <S%H6099>army.<s%>
Her <S%H1004>house<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2315>rooms<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
